title: VM Fitness Hub Backend Data Model
description: This document defines the data structures for User Profiles and Workout Plans stored in Firestore.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Represents a user's profile data stored in the 'users' collection.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

isAdmin.description: Flag indicating if the user has administrative privileges.

workoutPlan.title: Workout Plan
workoutPlan.description: Represents a workout plan generated by the AI and saved by a user. Stored in the '/users/{userId}/workoutPlans' subcollection.

title.description: A catchy and motivational title for the workout plan.

summary.description: A brief summary of the plan and some motivational words for the user.

weeklySchedule.description: The structured workout schedule for the week.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the workout plan was saved.

day.description: Day of the week or session number (e.g., Day 1, Monday).

focus.description: Main focus for the day (e.g., Upper Body, Full Body, Cardio & Core).

exercises.description: List of exercises for the day.

notes.description: Additional notes or instructions for the exercise.
